abstract: In another sign of deepening European government efforts to address the credit crisis, the Dutch government Friday took over the operations in the Netherlands of Fortis Bank, the troubled Belgian-Dutch lender.
snippet: In another sign of deepening European government efforts to address the credit crisis, the Dutch government Friday took over the operations in the Netherlands of Fortis Bank, the troubled Belgian-Dutch lender.
lead_paragraph: In another sign of deepening European government efforts to address the credit crisis, the Dutch government Friday took over the operations in the Netherlands of Fortis Bank, the troubled Belgian-Dutch lender, The New York Times’s Nelson D. Schwartz reported.

headline.main: Netherlands Takes Over Some Fortis Operations
